scripts.setup: npm run setupbackend && npm run setupfrontend
scripts.setupbackend: cd ../backend && python -m venv .venv && .\.venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: concurrently -t "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm" -n backend,extension -c bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold "npm run backend" "npm run watch"
scripts.startold: concurrently -t "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm" -n backend,typecheck,webpack -c bgRed.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgBlue.bold "npm run startbackend" "npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npx webpack"
